metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7948 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
X.org libXrandr before 1.5.1 allows remote X servers to trigger out-of-bounds write operations by leveraging mishandling of reply data.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxrandr2 - 2:1.5.1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> https://wiki.ubuntu.com/1204_HWE_EOL sbeattie> same commit as CVE-2016-7947 rodrigo-zaiden> there is a follow up commit, 87227e5f, that fixes a memory leak introduced in the first commit.

criterions.comment: libxrandr package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.5.1-1').
